com.sustech.snappat.CameraActivity.env

类 Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sustech.snappat.CameraActivity.env.Logger

  • public final class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the platform log function, allows convenient message prefixing and log disabling.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Logger()
      Creates a Logger using the caller's class name as the message prefix.
      Logger(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Creates a Logger using the class name as the message prefix.
      Logger(int minLogLevel)
      Creates a Logger using the caller's class name as the message prefix.
      Logger(java.lang.String messagePrefix)
      Creates a Logger using the specified message prefix.
      Logger(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String messagePrefix)
      Creates a Logger with a custom tag and a custom message prefix.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Creates a Logger using the class name as the message prefix.
        参数:
        clazz - the simple name of this class is used as the message prefix.

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.String messagePrefix)
        Creates a Logger using the specified message prefix.
        参数:
        messagePrefix - is prepended to the text of every message.

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.lang.String tag,
              java.lang.String messagePrefix)
        Creates a Logger with a custom tag and a custom message prefix. If the message prefix is set to 
        null
        , the caller's class name is used as the prefix.
        参数:
        tag - identifies the source of a log message.
        messagePrefix - prepended to every message if non-null. If null, the name of the caller is being used

      • Logger

        public Logger()
        Creates a Logger using the caller's class name as the message prefix.

      • Logger

        public Logger(int minLogLevel)
        Creates a Logger using the caller's class name as the message prefix.
